infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: InvestIQ needs camera access to scan properties for instant investment analysis.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: InvestIQ needs your location to identify properties you're looking at and show nearby investment opportunities.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: InvestIQ uses your location to identify properties and provide real-time investment analytics.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: InvestIQ uses the compass to determine which direction you're facing when scanning properties.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow InvestIQ to access your camera to scan properties.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow InvestIQ to use your location to identify properties.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow InvestIQ to use your location to identify properties.

plugins.motionPermission: Allow InvestIQ to access motion sensors for compass heading.
